import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.scss'] }) export class AboutComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} goHome() { this.router.navigate(['/auth']); } }

Track Smarter. Spend Wiser. 💰

Your personal finance companion — designed to help you track, plan, and grow.

trending_up

Visualize Expenses

Get a clear view of where your money goes with pie and bar charts.

savings

Monthly Summaries

Track income, spending, and savings by month automatically.

lock

Secure & Private

Your data is protected and never shared. Privacy-first design.

credit_card

Credit Card Tracker

Monitor your credit card dues, track payments, and manage installment progress.

receipt_long

Recurring Bills

Stay on top of regular monthly bills like rent, EMIs, and insurance without missing a due date.

Ready to take control of your finances?
